title: Newsmax Inc. Names Paula Dobriansky, Alex Acosta to Board of Directors | Newsmax Media, Inc.
snippet: Ambassador Dobriansky and Secretary Acosta join the five member Newsmax Board of Directors that includes its CEO, Chris Ruddy, Ambassador Nancy Brinker and Christopher Nixon Cox.

title: Newsmax adds David Gandler to board of directors | Editor and Publisher
